Trade/Device Name(s): iQ® 200 Urine Analyzer Body Fluids Module
Submitter Information: Iris Diagnostics, A Division of IRIS International, Inc.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for iQ® 200 Urine Analyzer Body Fluids Module for automated RBC and nucleated cell counting in CSF and serous body fluids.
Indications for Use Summary: Used by a competent human observer to examine and count red blood cells and nucleated cells in cerebrospinal fluid and serous fluids to aid diagnosis of infections, hemorrhages, malignancies, and central nervous system disorders.
